    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Periodic table</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Periodische Tabelle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Table périodique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tabela periódica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Tabella periodica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Περιοδικός πίνακας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Vector periódico</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is first of two illustration showing the periodic table of elements. Here, the different types of oxides formed by these elements are indicated.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">acidic oxide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">amphoteric oxide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">basic oxide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">chemical elements</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">covalent bonding</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ionic bonding</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">periodic table</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist erstes der Abbildung zwei, welche die 
periodische Tabelle der Elemente zeigt. Hier werden die 
unterschiedlichen Typen der Oxide, die durch diese Elemente gebildet 
werden, angezeigt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est premier de l'illustration deux montrant la 
table périodique des éléments. Ici, les différents types 
d'oxydes constitués par ces éléments sont indiqués.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este é primeiro da ilustração dois que mostra 
a tabela periódica dos elementos. Aqui, os tipos diferentes de 
óxidos dados forma por estes elementos são indicados.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è una prima dell'illustrazione due che 
mostra la tabella periodica degli elementi. Qui, i tipi 
differenti di ossidi costituiti da questi elementi sono indicati.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι πρώτη της απεικόνισης δύο που εμφανίζει 
περιοδικό πίνακα των στοιχείων. Εδώ, οι διαφορετικοί τύποι
οξειδίων που διαμορφώνονται από αυτά τα στοιχεία είναι 
υποδειγμένοι.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Éste es primer de la ilustración dos que 
muestra el vector periódico de elementos. Aquí, los diversos 
tipos de óxidos formados por estos elementos se indican.</string>
          </description>
